skills.name: Machine Learning
skills.summary: Specialized in forecasting and predictive modeling with deep expertise in neural network architectures. Proven track record in competitions with top placements in national data science contests, focusing on time-series forecasting and multivariate analysis.

sections.title: Time-Series Forecasting
sections.description: Expert in building advanced forecasting models using NHITS, NBEATSx, LSTM, TiDE, and TSMixerx architectures. Successfully developed models to predict daily food prices across 34 Indonesian provinces with 13 commodities, achieving top performance in competitive environments.

sections.title: Hybrid Deep Learning
sections.description: Developed innovative CNN-LSTM hybrid architectures for multivariate forecasting tasks. Specialized in combining convolutional layers for feature extraction with recurrent networks for sequential pattern recognition, particularly effective for food price index predictions.

sections.title: Neural Network Optimization
sections.description: Proficient in hyperparameter optimization using Keras Tuner and advanced model architectures. Experience with CNN implementations on MNIST and Fashion-MNIST datasets, focusing on performance optimization and model efficiency.

skills.name: Computer Vision
skills.summary: Developing visual recognition systems and image processing applications. Experience in creating practical CV solutions for real-world applications including gesture recognition and image analysis.

sections.title: Image Processing
sections.description: Advanced techniques in image preprocessing, filtering, and enhancement. Experience with OpenCV and various computer vision libraries for image manipulation and analysis.

sections.title: Object Detection
sections.description: Implementing object detection and recognition systems using deep learning models. Experience with YOLO, R-CNN variants, and custom detection pipelines for specific use cases.

sections.title: Gesture Recognition
sections.description: Developed hand gesture recognition systems for music control applications, demonstrating practical implementation of computer vision in interactive systems and real-time processing.

skills.name: Prompting
skills.summary: Expert in crafting effective prompts for AI language models to achieve optimal results. Deep understanding of prompt engineering techniques and AI model behavior optimization.

sections.title: Prompt Engineering
sections.description: Developing sophisticated prompting strategies for various AI tasks including text generation, analysis, and problem-solving. Understanding of different prompting techniques and their applications.

sections.title: AI Model Optimization
sections.description: Fine-tuning prompt strategies to maximize AI model performance and accuracy. Experience with different model architectures and their specific prompting requirements.

sections.title: Conversational AI
sections.description: Designing prompts for conversational AI systems and chatbots. Focus on creating natural, context-aware interactions that provide value to users.

skills.name: Natural Language Processing
skills.summary: Building intelligent language processing systems with expertise in transformer models and large language models. Focus on developing personalized AI assistants and language understanding applications.

sections.title: Language Models
sections.description: Working with transformer-based models and LLMs for various NLP tasks. Experience in model fine-tuning, training, and optimization for specific language processing requirements.

sections.title: Text Analysis
sections.description: Implementing text classification, sentiment analysis, and information extraction systems. Skilled in preprocessing text data and building robust NLP pipelines.

sections.title: Personalized AI
sections.description: Currently developing a personalized AI Assistant using transformer models, tailored to individual user communication styles and preferences. Focus on adaptive language understanding.
